item.description:
This is a meet up group for those who are insprired by the world of beauty and fashion and working to start, build and grow as a stylist.  This group is about having fun doing what you love to do and collaborating with others to make things happen.

Our meetings will be very different. They will vary from trainings, seminars and planning events to help group members  build and update their portfolios and "connect" events to meet with industry professionals to help you expand your contacts and potential.

Whether you're just starting out as a stylist or have been working for many years, we want you to join us.

The beauty and fashion industy is fun and exciting and we want our meetings to contiue that fun, exciting and positive energy.

We welcome hair, makeup, and nail artists, photographers, fashion  designers and models to join our group. We also welcome schools, production companies, event planners and other interested professionals to join in too.

Experienced professionals, please contact me about hosting or speaking at one of our meetings.
item.name: Boston Beauty, Fashion and Photo Stylist
